instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-02016: What is 820-02016? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02016</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no video
threads.message:
water damage

there is connection dp800 to jp600 pin 43
qp800

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02016</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no video
threads.message:
"macbook start normaly"
Do you mean it chimes and has USB activity?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02016</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no video
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02016</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no video
threads.message:
Image should appear before the backlight.
Did you test with known good LCD assembly?

<SIGNAL>LPDP_INT_HPD</SIGNAL> goes high?
